Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4101_19.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4101_19.jpg'}
{3: 'Watanabe'}
{1: '1', 3: "I think I'm no longer with you by the time you hear this.", 4: '1'}
{3: "I don't know how long it will take for this message to reach you.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Just like I'm unsure if we will succeed.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'We must have succeeded if this reaches you, right?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Take some time to listen to my rambling.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Tsuru left too early, and I spent too little time with you, so you became too mature and too quiet when you were still young.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'But how could a father not understand his child?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'I know the question that has bothered you since your youth, and I was waiting for you to ask, but you never did.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Just when I thought it would be a shadow you'd deliberately avoid, you told me that you were joining the military when you were 18.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'I was scared then. I was afraid you were following the same path because of me and Tsuru, but you gave me an unexpected answer.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'So, my son, do you understand why your mother made that choice now?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Would you make the same decision if you do?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Let me tell you my answer, since I probably won't hear yours.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Unity is the foundation of civilization.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Civilization evolves from savagery. Survival of the fittest is the law of savages, not the law of a civilization.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Civilization emerges to resist savagery, to defy the natural law of survival of the fittest.', 4: '1'}
{3: "We won't abandon our weaker compatriots or bow to natural disasters. The only thing that can make us give up is ourselves.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Why is there still so much selfishness, scheming, and betrayal then? You might ask.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Because unity is painful.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before we build civilization, we are still a part of nature.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Our animal instincts make us avoid harm and seek gains, but the continuation of civilization requires us to defy this instinct and learn to give and share.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'So, does civilization still matter? Does unity still matter?', 4: '1'}
{3: "You may find yourself asking this question over and over again in the future because the path you choose won't be easy.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'I want to tell you that it matters.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Civilization matters. Unity matters.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The process of unity has a price, but its rewards can be shared and passed on.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The reason humanity has come this far, the reason civilization has endured, is due to the continuation of each instance of unity.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'This comes from another instinct of ours—love.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Love and unity have helped humanity traverse the past and present, Watanabe.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'I believe it will help us traverse the future, just as it did over ten thousand years ago.'}
{3: 'You may face hardships, injustice, and even betrayal during this journey.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Ui/Spine/UiSpine/UiMovieSpine/UiMovieDubian/UimovieDubian03idle1.prefab'}
{3: "That's when you should look back..."}
{3: "Look at those you've saved..."}
{3: 'Look at those who have influenced you...'}
{3: "Look at those you've influenced..."}
{3: 'Look at those who made the same choices.'}
{3: 'The era of the World Government has passed...'}
{3: "But when you realize that immense space power isn't the Golden Age, and the World Government isn't the Golden Age..."}
{3: "When you understand that the Golden Age isn't the text in the history books, but the beliefs, thoughts, and actions of the people..."}
{3: "That's when you'll create your own Golden Age."}
{3: 'Love and unity will be passed on, and humanity will rely on them to rebuild the spine of the world.'}
{3: 'So, Watanabe, this path is destined to be difficult...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Ui/Spine/UiSpine/UiMovieSpine/UiMovieDubian/UimovieDubian03idle2.prefab'}
{3: 'But it will never be lonely.'}
{3: 'I believe that humanity will choose love and unity in this calamity as it did before.'}
{3: 'Even though there might be occasional disagreements and conflicts, we will certainly fulfill our initial promise in the end.'}
{3: 'A World for All.'}
{3: 'I believe that humanity will once again talk about science, art, and the future amidst flowers and green grass under a blue sky.'}
{3: 'Then, we will surely see your footprints in the universe and hear your stories as stardust in the sky.'}
{3: 'The time has come. I must go ahead in order to protect those I love and the world I cherish.'}
{3: 'So this is the last thing I want to say to you.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'I love you, Watanabe, and I will always be proud of you.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory830.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{3: 'The message in the terminal ends here. Words that have never been heard finally reach the ears they were meant for after decades.'}
{3: "Watanabe found this message while sifting through Ballard's belongings. How his father's message ended up in Ballard's hands is something Watanabe will never know."}
{3: "The conflict Ballard deliberately incited has gradually died down since his passing and Watanabe's return."}
{3: "Having learned the truth, the people rejoice in Watanabe's return while beginning to denounce those advocating for war."}
{3: "As Ballard predicted, the situation was out of his control the moment he had to rely on Watanabe's prominence to stir up people's hatred."}
{3: 'The spark lit by hatred could naturally be extinguished by the return of the "resurrected."'}
{3: 'But this does not mean the unrest has left no impact...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Ui/Spine/UiSpine/UiMovieSpine/UiMovieDubian/UiMovieDubian01.prefab'}
{2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'Boss, the Babylonia delegation is arriving soon.'}
{3: 'The tense relationship between Forsaken and Babylonia has not eased with the end of the conflict.'}
{3: 'Neither side plans to withdraw their troops from the border without any precautions.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Hmm... Got it.'}
{3: 'Watanabe looks at the medal in his hand. It is another item left by Ballard.'}
{3: 'The launch codes for the 7295 missiles scattered in space are in there. With this sword, Babylonia will never rest easy.'}
{3: "And now, it is in Watanabe's hands."}
{3: 'As long as he holds this sword, Forsaken will not abandon the territory they have gained, and Babylonia can never truly reconcile with them.'}
{3: "It will be hard to achieve real peace in this prisoner's dilemma."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Unity comes at a price...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4101_05.jpg'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'What do you believe in? What do you stand for? Who do you fight for?!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory830.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Ui/Spine/UiSpine/UiMovieSpine/UiMovieDubian/UiMovieDubian01.prefab'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I understood it a long time ago.'}
{3: 'He grips the medal tightly in his hand. It is a sword he will never let go.'}
{3: 'Unity does not mean one side compromising to the other, nor does it mean one side surrendering to the other.'}
{3: 'Sometimes, matching forces can calm both sides down so that they sit at the negotiation table.'}
{3: 'But those are the two sides of the coin—one says peace, the other destruction.'}
{3: 'If either side decides to flip the coin and press the button, at least one side will face total annihilation.'}
{3: 'Will Watanabe press the button? Will Babylonia fire the Longinus Arsenal? Those questions will accompany Watanabe for the rest of his life.'}
{3: "He does not intend to hide the existence of this sword, even if it makes him a thorn in Babylonia's side again."}
{3: 'Those who hate Babylonia will crave this power of destruction, and those who seek reconciliation will despise its hostility.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'This is the price of unity...'}
{3: 'He loves his comrades so deeply. How can he let them be at the mercy of others?'}
{3: 'He will bring greater fear, if only for lasting peace.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory263.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Over here, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee stands guard before you, cautiously moving forward while staying alert to every blind spot.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Liv, can I have an update on the surroundings?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'There are no unknown signals within a ten-kilometer radius.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Understood. Stay vigilant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'This is just a business trip...', 3: '135'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory524.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: 'After Gray Raven brought you back to Babylonia, the Star of Life immediately arranged a full medical check-up.'}
{3: 'It was then that they learned what you had gone through during your disappearance.'}
{2: "I'm sorry. If I had returned earlier...", 3: '142'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'No, you made the right choice, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'The Purifying Force rooted out several moles in the conservation area after that, and they all had your full profile.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'If you went to the conservation area rashly, you could have run into them.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Seeing that you still want to say something, Lucia cuts you off.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Just focus on recovering, Commandant. Leave security to us.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lee does not speak, but he nods in agreement.'}
{2: "Actually, that's exactly what I wanted to talk about...", 3: '154'}
{2: "Isn't 24-hour surveillance a bit excessive?", 3: '155'}
{3: 'Having finished checking your medicine, Liv turns to look at you with almost pleading eyes.'}
{2: 'What about the military?', 3: '166'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commander Nikola has also agreed.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Alright, then. I'll listen to you this time.", 3: '168'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Please take your medication, then, Commandant.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory263.png'}
{3: 'Three days after your return, you receive an invitation from the Diplomatic Court to join a negotiation with the Forsaken in the central buffer zone.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Lee, keep an eye on the surroundings. I'll check the transport craft.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Isn't this a bit overprotective...", 3: '181'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "We won't lose you again.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "What a tight unit you are. Alright, I'll let you inspect it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Anyone who doubts the quality of my transport craft usually gets a whack on the head from me.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Are you the pilot this time, Bridget?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "We're the Support Force. We go wherever we're needed.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liszt', 3: "And I'm sure you'll feel more at ease if the pilot is someone familiar.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A man in a suit walks over.'}
{2: 'Councilor Liszt.', 3: '198'}
{2: 'Liszt', 3: 'First of all, I want to thank you for coming, Gray Raven Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: "You're welcome.", 3: '200'}
{2: 'I also want to know how things are with the Forsaken.', 3: '201'}
{2: 'Liszt', 3: 'Indeed, we invited you partly because of your good relationship with the Forsaken.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liszt', 3: 'After all, this is our first negotiation since then. We want to show more goodwill.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'His tone suddenly shifts, and he stares at you sharply.'}
{2: 'Liszt', 3: 'You know what your stand should be, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Where I stand has never changed.', 3: '211'}
{2: 'Liszt', 3: 'And that is...?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory830.jpg', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Watanabe puts away the medal and turns toward those who await him.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Let's go. It's time for us...", 4: '11'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe & 【kuroname】', 3: 'To reforge the spine of this era.', 4: '12', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory394.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Putting down a box taller than himself, Changyu wipes nonexistent sweat from his forehead.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Phew... Finally.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Even though it's a town full of drunkards, the defenses aren't too shabby...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Next up is... Ah, speak of the devil.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory121.png', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'How did things go, Changyu?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "I've reached the designated spot, just waiting for our contact.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "But this guy was barely alive when I arrived. Don't blame me for any loss.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'The royal family will find a way to save him.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Is there something special about this guy?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "You wouldn't have made a bad deal.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "The royal family needs people like this, doesn't it?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'I\'m quite eager to see how many obstacles this "Scorpio" can eliminate for us.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "You shouldn't have released that announcement.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '????', 3: "It's rare to see you oppose me so directly.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: '"We are just spectators... We are not qualified to intervene. All we need to do is watch quietly until the chess game is decided."', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: 'These were your exact words. Why are you going against them now?', 4: '2'}
{2: '????', 3: 'Using my own words against me... You\'ve become more "human," Gestalt.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'And you?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Why did you do it when you knew that releasing the sealed information equates to releasing the "contaminating memetics"?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Dominik.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dominik', 3: "...It's been a long time since anyone called me that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dominik', 3: 'My reason was simple. I wanted to inject a dose of sedative into humanity at their most irrational moment to prevent them from destroying each other.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'The "contaminating memetics" can bring destruction too, and a more sweeping one at that.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dominik', 3: 'But we can delay it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'The countdown has already begun. We can no longer stop it.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'I stopped it for the first time during the moment of the Punishing Virus outbreak by ordering global satellites to self-destruct and taking myself down.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Nithart and you stopped it the second time during the Post-Pandemic Age.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: "We don't have a second Nithart or an uncontaminated you anymore.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Who else can stop it?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Unless you can find the real Dominik?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dominik', 3: "I'm just the memory data Dominik left before they entered Reactor One. I don't know what state they are in right now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dominik', 3: "Even though I had some ideas after reading that Omega File, I'm afraid there's no way for me to verify them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dominik', 3: 'However, a reference for the solution of the "contaminating memetics" may have already appeared.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A grand ringed city with labyrinthine streets, densely packed buildings, and vast underground spaces appear before "Dominik".'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Has it begun?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dominik', 3: 'It has begun.', 4: '1'}
